snippet: MATELES--Richard. Age 80, in Chicago on May 30, 2016. Richard, a member of the Sons of the American Revolution, was a descendant of Abraham de Lucena, one of the earliest Jews of North America, who settled in New Amsterdam in 1655. Richard is survived by his wife, Roslyn (Fish) of Chicago; three daughters, Naomi Karmi and Susan Spira (both of Israel), and Sarah Mateles of Buffalo Grove, IL; and seven grandchildren. A private burial was held at Congregation Shearith Israel's Beth Olam Cemetery on June 2, 2016. 1/3
